reviews.text: Helpfull staff who sell tickets. Trains arriving all the time. Has a small shop next to it too.

Decent enough station which has seating, shelters, a shop and step free access on both sides of the platforms. The subway linking the platforms is a bit narrow honestly but other facilities like the toilets were really clean.

Parking is available here as well as being served by local buses to Kingston, Esher, Ashford, Staines and Heathrow.

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Walton-on-Thames is located in the town of Walton and is used by Southwest Trains, Walton-on-Thames is a reliable train station used by many every day, Staff at the station are kind and patient, trains arrive often, the area is quiet and peaceful. There is an Audi dealership nearby and the station is clean.

The bicycle parking suffers from permanent bikes that haven't moved for months. There are around 40 bikes taking up valuable space which need removing. It would be nice to see these bikes removed to make way for others who wish to use this excellent facility.
only ever been here twice, but both times it was ok
